 2.5 - INPUT MODALITIES
TARGET SIZE (MINIMUM)(LEVEL AA)
On accessible websites...

[New]

Targets have an area of at least 24 by 24 CSS pixels, except where:

 * Spacing: The target offset is at least 24 CSS pixels to every adjacent
   target;
 * Inline: The target is in a sentence or block of text;
 * Essential: A particular presentation of the target is essential to the
   information being conveyed.

These websites...

Make it easier for users to operate functionality through various inputs beyond
keyboard.

WHAT'S AN EXAMPLE?
Three buttons are on-screen and the target area of each button is 24 by 24 CSS
pixels. Since the target size itself is 24 by 24 CSS pixels, no additional
